poemsDataJson.list_full: わたの原(はら) 八十島(やそしま)かけて 漕(こ)ぎ出(い)でぬと 人(ひと)には告(つ)げよ あまの釣舟(つりぶね)
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: Over the wide sea//Towards its many distant isles//My ship sets sail.//Will the fishing boats thronged here//Proclaim my journey to the world?
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Wata no hara|Yaso-shima kakete|Kogi idenu to|Hito ni wa tsugeyo|Ama no tsuri-bune
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: ひとにはつけよ あまのつりふね
poemsDataJson.author: 参議篁(さんぎたかむら)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 配流の舟出の孤独感と、都の人に寄せる思慕の情
